name: Edublogify Contact form
author: Prashant Kansal

sections.description:
Edublogify Contact form can manage contact form.It’s simple contact form.ECF allow you to create beautiful contact form.ECF is a mobile responsive contact form solution, so your contact form will always look great on all devices (mobile, tablet, laptop, and desktop). It adapts to your screen size and works on any device.

ECF form style

This plugin provides a shortcode that are made to wrap around your Edublogify Contact Form shortcode and apply a beautiful contact form to them.

Currently supported:

  • Beautiful Contact form
  • Text input
  • Email input
  • Submit button

Top Features

  • Intuitive user interface !
  • Easy to use !
  • NO LIMITATIONS on the number of forms
  • Responsive design by default!

Edublogify Contact Form is a free WordPress plugin by Prashant Kansal.

Edublogify Contact form Needs Your Support

It’s my first plugin and It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire Edublogify Contact form folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. add shortcode [EDUCONTACTFORM] and enjoy it.

You will find ‘Edublogify Form’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

OR go to ‘Plugins’ > ‘Add new’, and search for ‘edublogify contact form’ to install through the WordPress dashboard.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Edublogify Contact form.??
please send mail me prashantkansal4@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed some bugs.
  • Added Database Table.
  • Added Submenu in admin panel.
  • Added Separate Shortcode menu.
  • Fixed some errors.
